definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.chinese: 该地图集还强调了其它方面的不平衡状况。

sentences.english: Division design is one of the principal problems in electronic atlas design.
sentences.chinese: 分幅地图是电子地图集设计中的一个主要问题。

sentences.english: If you use the atlases on microfilm, copies are easily made.
sentences.chinese: 如果利用微缩胶片地图集，那么很容易制作拷贝品。

sentences.english: This atlas describes the anatomical basics of dendrochronology and wood technology.
sentences.chinese: 这本地图集描述树木年代学和木头技术的解剖的基础。

sentences.english: According to the "Atlas of the Chinese language", the Qixian dialect belongs to Bingzhou part of Jin dialect.
sentences.chinese: 在《中国语言地图集》中，祁县方言属晋语并州片。

sentences.english: This page provides lots of information about project and data, including a selection of animated maps.
sentences.chinese: 此站点提供计划与数据的大量信息，包括动态地图集。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
narrative history/comprehensive history/a history covering an extended period
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
